channel.title: How i make allowed 2 connections from ip i got one now! PLEASE LOOK
channel.description:
Or so in all delta basic is this: [code] for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }[/code]
THen can only 1 ppl login at one pc and 1 IP so if you have 2 computers at home and you brother wanna play he can't so how can i make this it allow 2 ?? please some1 help ?

item.title: How i make allowed 2 connections from ip i got one now! PLEASE LOOK
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

Or so in all delta basic is this:

for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }

THen can only 1 ppl login at one pc and 1 IP so if you have 2 computers at home and you brother wanna play he can’t so how can i make this it allow 2 ?? please some1 help ?
